729737f-a.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Four Corners Road
729737f-a.text:
Todt Hill ROad, east side, between Four Corners
Road and Coventry Road, showing the north side and garden
of the M. Stanton resiuence, locateu on block 894, lot 28.
Ahe two views were taken the same day.
Sumaer, 1932
Views 1-2
P. L. Sperr
NO REPROAUCTIONS

729738f-a.text:
Todt Hill Read, east side,beteeen Four Corners
Road and Coventry Road, showing the N. Stanton resi-
dence on part of the former George Cromwell estate.
The house is situated on block 894, lot 28. The
three views ere taken the same day.
Summer,1932

729739f-c.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Four Corners Road
729739f-c.text:
(1)
Todt Hill Road, east side, 800 feet south of Four
Corners Road, showing the George Cromwell Mansion. The
maps of 1874 and 1898 show it to have been the Benedict
mansion and was known at the latter date as ''Far View.''
This is the front and south side of the mansion.
August 3, 1926
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The front and east side of the house.
August 3, 1926
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
A full view of the east end of the house.
August 3, 1926
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729739f-c.folder: Todt Hill Road & Four Corners Road, Staten Island, NY

729740f-c.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Four Corners Road
729740f-c.text:
(1)
Todt Hill Road, east side, 80U feet south of Four Corners
Road, showing a front view of the George Cromwell Mansion
facing south. The mansion was prewtously (1898-1874 maps)
owned by the Benedict family.
August 3, 1926
L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The west end of the mansion and the entrance from
Todt Hill Road.
April 22, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
The barn on the Cromwell estate, directly to the
south of the driveway to the mansion. The view is south on
Todt Hill Road.
April 22, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
